verses.name: 1 Kings 10:15
verses.text: Beside that he had of the merchantmen, and of the traffick of the spice merchants, and of all the kings of Arabia, and of the governors of the country.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:16
verses.text: And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold: six hundred shekels of gold went to one target.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:17
verses.text: And he made three hundred shields of beaten gold; three pound of gold went to one shield: and the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:18
verses.text: Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory, and overlaid it with the best gold.
